title: NewsBreak: Sterling Jumps on Report of Brexit Breakthrough
text:
NewsBreak: Sterling Jumps on Report of Brexit Breakthrough

Forex 25 minutes ago (Oct 16, 2019 01:49)

© Reuters. Investing.com - The pound spiked on Tuesday after Bloomberg reported that the U.K. and European Union are close to agreeing on a legal draft of a Brexit deal. The deal however is dependent on Prime Minister Boris Johnson getting support from the Northern Irish Democratic Unionist Party, which is uncertain. The two sides are racing to reach a deal before the Oct. 31 deadline, but remain optimistic that an agreement will be made by the end of Tuesday. soared 1.1% to 1.2738 as of 10:44 AM ET (14:44 GMT) while tumbled 1.1% to 0.8658. was flat at 1.1027.

NewsBreak: Sterling Jumps on Report of Brexit Breakthrough
